channel.title: Software Design on Welcome to dave.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Software Design on Welcome to dave.dev

item.title: Terraform Example Provider
item.description: A requirement came up to extract a schema from a Terraform provider in JSON, which Terraform offers as a native feature as of version 0.

item.title: Natural Systems vs Human Fallibility
item.description: Some thoughts on systems that I describe as natural ones. These systems allow constituent components to behave within confines of wider system rules and don’t care for specifics.

item.title: Some Thoughts On Complexity
item.description: Brace yourself reader. Future me, you may disagree with what’s in here.
